content.en: Fractional differential equations: Artificial neural networks are being used to solve various types of fractional differential equations. These algorithms combine neural network approaches with other methods such as power series or truncated series expansion to approximate the solutions of these equations. The goal is to accurately compute parameters and optimize the solutions using algorithms like Levenberg-Marquardt. This research has applications in computer artificial intelligence algorithms and can help in modeling and analyzing complex phenomena.
content.da: Fraktionelle differentialligninger: Kunstige neurale netværk bliver brugt til at løse forskellige typer af fraktionelle differentialligninger. Disse algoritmer kombinerer neurale netværkstilgange med andre metoder såsom potensserier eller truncerede serieudvidelser for at approksimere løsningerne af disse ligninger. Målet er at beregne parametre nøjagtigt og optimere løsningerne ved hjælp af algoritmer som Levenberg-Marquardt. Denne forskning har anvendelser inden for computer kunstig intelligens algoritmer og kan hjælpe med at modellere og analysere komplekse fænomener.
